sec.div: TAC & size limit & no LBSP and full regulation scenarios
sec.p: The combined size limit, TAC and no LBSP scenario and the full regulation scenario (combined size limit, TAC, no LBSP and MPAs), had respectively two and four metrics that almost reached the criteria ( Fig 3), indicating improved ecosystem state compared to the status quo, but at the cost of 80% and 79%, respectively, in status quo fishery landings. The bumphead parrotfish was still overexploited.
